document.heading: Small and Certified Business Enterprise Development and Assistance Amendment Act of 2013

history.narrative: Law 20-108, the “Small and Certified Business Enterprise Development and Assistance Amendment Act of 2013,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-181. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Feb. 4, 2014, and Mar. 4, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 4, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-307 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-108 became effective on June 10, 2014.
